root.Summary: 1: Southwell AL, Franciosi S, Villanueva EB, Xie Y, Winter LA, Veeraraghavan J,Jonason A, Felczak B, Zhang W, Kovalik V, Waltl S, Hall G, Pouladi MA, Smith ES, Bowers WJ, Zauderer M, Hayden MR. Anti-semaphorin 4D immunotherapy amelioratesneuropathology and some cognitive impairment in the YAC128 mouse model ofHuntington disease. Neurobiol Dis. 2015 Apr;76:46-56. doi:10.1016/j.nbd.2015.01.002. Epub 2015 Feb 3. PubMed PMID: 25662335.
